sub_title: Skilled manager with experience in sourcing, procurement, operations, compliance and project management in large international companies.
summary:
Helping leaders and companies to make smart decisions, mitigate risk, standardize and improve in area of S2P business processes and ensure operational stability and high level of compliance behavior.

A Senior Project Manager with 20+ years of experience in Sourcing & Procurement Project Management, New Product Introduction, Process Improvement, Compliance remediation & process standardization projects while managing remote teams across three continents.

• Led Global Procurement Compliance team with focus on process standardization, risk mitigation, increase
of ethics and compliance awareness by driving remediation plans with outcome of successful SOX 404 attestation for Procurement domain with 100% compliance efficiency at 2022 YE.

• Executed Global Procurement Guideline project roll-out for CEE region.

• Supported Global Internal Procurement Audit and coordinated remediation activities.

• Managed Procurement owned risks within ERM (Enterprise Risk Management) program.

• Provided support as Compliance champion in LDC (Lean Digital Core) program.

• Prepared and executed implementation of ONCE (One Novartis Compliance Environment) project.

• Helped streamline and standardize Purchase to Pay processes by supporting SAP implementation in Czechia, Slovakia, Poland, Switzerland and Canada

Responsive, spontaneously practical with "scientist brain" profile (SEI). Always ready to create order, clarity and offer "right answers" to challenges of operational questions and tasks.
